dict.acceptation: 重量，体重；重担，重任；重要；[统]权，加重值，权重；
加重于，使变重；使负重，使负担或压迫；[统]使加权，附加加重值于；

sent.orig: Weight Memo shows something about the weight emphatically, such as weight, weight, etc.
sent.trans: 重量单侧重说明重量内容，如：毛重、净重等。

sent.orig: Deducting the tare weight from the gross weight, we get the net weight.
sent.trans: 毛重扣掉外包装重量便得到净重。

sent.orig: Maximum container gross weight (cargo gross weight plus container weight) is 30 mt to port only.
sent.trans: 港口集装箱的最大总重量（货物总重量加上集装箱自身重量）是30公吨。

sent.orig: Weight: including tare weight and net weight.
The weight put on this thread was a weight of two pounds.
sent.trans: 放在这条绳子上的重物为两磅。
